attributes.additional_details: Menstrual products are seen as a ‘luxury’ item but are a necessity for most women or individuals who experience menstruation. They are an integral part of female health and hygiene yet a surprising amount of people struggle to afford them and are forced to go without.
attributes.background: Sanitary products to be covered by the NHS. Get rid of pink tax.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618799

VAT on women’s sanitary products was abolished last year: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/tampon-tax-abolished-from-today
